name: Stealing Osiris
description:
A game built for Historically Accurate Game Jam 4.

As the legend says, after Set killed his brother, Osiris, his wife, Isis, tried to reassemble his body. Set then tried to destroy his brother's body by transforming himself into a leopard. However, he was stopped by Anubis.

In this game you play as Set. You must reach Osiris's sarcophagus by completing a number of puzzles. But be careful, Anubis still roams around to protect Osiris's body.

Controls:

W, A, S, D  -  move around

C - transform into a leopard / human

E - interact with objects
